mapper.select: select POST_ID, BOARD_ID, USER_ID, SUBJECT, CONTENT, POST_FILE, TO_CHAR(POST_DATE,'MM/DD HH24:MI') as POST_DATE, LIKE_COUNT, SCRAP_COUNT, REPORT_COUNT, STATUS from post where POST_ID = #{post_id}
select count(*) from post where board_id = #{board_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST (POST_ID, BOARD_ID, USER_ID, SUBJECT, CONTENT, POST_DATE, LIKE_COUNT, SCRAP_COUNT, REPORT_COUNT, STATUS) VALUES (post_seq.nextval, #{BOARD_ID}, #{USER_ID}, #{SUBJECT}, #{CONTENT}, SYSDATE, 0, 0 , 0 ,1)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT B.BOARD_ID, B.NAME AS BOARDNAME, P.SUBJECT, TO_CHAR(P.POST_DATE, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') POST_DATE, P.POST_ID FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN POST P ON B.BOARD_ID = P.BOARD_ID WHERE B.BOARD_ID = #{BOARD_ID} AND B.TYPE = 1 AND B.STATUS = 1 ORDER BY P.POST_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
